refnamediv.refpurpose: Useful scripts for combining and comparing Debian derivatives

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: mdt is the entry point for MultiDistroTools (mdt stands for MultiDistroTools). MultiDistroTools provides some useful scripts allowing to generate and combine package lists and retrieve information from them. It aims at automating all the tasks that most MOTUs, for example, have to do on a regular basis.
Run mdt without argument to get inline help.

listitem.para: Without argument, lists all available commands and their summaries. With argument, shows some help for the given command.
